overview: The Digital Experience Healthcare homepage provides a responsive, accessible landing page with navigation, hero content, and introductory sections promoting healthcare services. It includes navigation links, theme toggle, and call-to-action buttons leading to other pages.
key_components: Sticky navigation bar with brand and menu
Hero section with title, description, and CTAs
interactions: Clicking navigation links routes to Home, More Information, or Contact pages
Theme toggle button switches between light and dark modes
Skip to content link focuses main content for accessibility
CTA buttons navigate to service and contact pages
data_flow: Static HTML content rendered directly from index.html
Navigation links trigger full page reloads to other static routes
Theme toggle likely updates DOM class or attribute to persist theme state
No dynamic data fetching or API calls observed
accessibility: ARIA labels on navigation and buttons
Semantic headings and landmarks (header, main, section, article)
Alt attributes on images (decorative image marked aria-hidden)
Proper use of aria-current and aria-pressed states
analytics: Potential click tracking on nav links and CTA buttons
Page view tracking on route changes
test_ideas: Verify skip-to-content link moves focus to main content
Validate navigation links route correctly and highlight active page
Check theme toggle updates aria-pressed and visual theme
Ensure hero CTAs navigate to correct pages
Confirm all interactive elements are keyboard accessible
Validate responsive layout across viewport sizes
Check meta tags and title for SEO compliance
Verify no accessibility violations using axe-core
